thread.title: Noyes Adds Industry Veteran to Its Lineup
thread.title_full: Noyes Adds Industry Veteran to Its Lineup

author: PRWEB
title: Noyes Adds Industry Veteran to Its Lineup
text:
Noyes continues to enjoy significant growth and attract top talent to our outstanding team of financial advisors. CHICAGO, IL (PRWEB) July 20, 2015
Noyes, a 107 years old wealth management and investment-banking firm, announced today the hiring of Jim Abraham, as Vice President, Wealth Advisor.
Abraham is an industry veteran with more than three decades of experience in wealth management and investment planning. Based at Noyes’ Chicago office, he will focus on providing comprehensive wealth management and retirement advisory services to the firm’s clientele. He joins Noyes from Stifel Financial Corp. in Chicago, where as Vice President Investments he was responsible for active management of client assets and financial planning.
“Noyes continues to enjoy significant growth and attract top talent to our outstanding team of financial advisors,” stated Jim Lynch, Managing Director. “Jim is an industry veteran with an impressive expertise and strong track record of providing superior clients service.”
Commenting on his new position Abraham said, “My decision to join Noyes was driven by a series of factors, including the firm’s tenure, stability, talented management, and outstanding reputation both in the financial services industry and the community.”
Abraham began his career in 1979 at Oppenheimer & Company in Chicago, as a Vice President. After that, he joined Prudential Bache Securities in Chicago. Abraham earned a Bachelor of Science in Chemical Engineering from the University of Bombay (India), a Master of Science in Chemical Engineering from Worcester Polytechnic Institute and an MBA in Finance and Marketing from Northwestern University-Kellogg School of Management. In addition to a Life Insurance and Health Insurance license, he holds FINRA Licenses Series 3, 7, 63 and 65.
About Noyes
Noyes, through its subsidiaries David A. Noyes & Company and Noyes Advisors, LLC is a full-service investment firm headquartered in downtown Chicago with branches throughout the Midwest. Founded in 1908, the firm is one of the oldest securities firms in Chicago, and has served the Indianapolis area for nearly 80 years. The employee owned firm offers a comprehensive menu of products and services to individual and institutional clients. Noyes has seven offices in Illinois, Indiana and Michigan. For more visit http://www.danoyes.com .
